publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2359 Mr Tom McCabe: Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill be passed. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*, Mr Jack McConnell*, Tavish Scott*, Mr Jim Wallace*

S2M-2359 Mr Tom McCabe: Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.2) Bill be passed. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran, Mr Jack McConnell, Tavish Scott, Mr Jim Wallace
